price: (158) And the punishment seized them. Indeed in that is a sign, but most of them were not to be believers.
arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
